ai-thig5.3:1.2_0: I was racked by desire for pleasures of the senses.
ai-thig5.3:1.3_0: I was restless in the past,
ai-thig5.3:2.3_0: I gained no peace of mind.
ai-thig5.3:2.4_0: Under the sway of lustful thoughts,
ai-thig5.3:3.4_0: finding no happiness by day or night.
ai-thig5.3:4.2_0: I entered deep into the forest, thinking:
ai-thig5.3:4.4_0: than I return to a lesser life.”
ai-thig5.3:5.2_0: and tied it to the branch of a tree.
